medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Lower abdominal pain started around 10 PM yesterday and worsened around 3 AM. The patient had an episode of emesis at 2 AM which did not relieve his symptoms. He also reports fever at home, which lowered with Tylenol.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of asthma; past medical history includes anal fistulectomy.
